summary: When a virus pandemic traps teenage Aimy Micry within a quarantine, a cat and mouse battle ensues between her, her evil family, and her stepford rival.
cast: Allisyn Snyder|Crispin Glover|Terry Moore|Paz de la Huerta|Michael William Hunter|Theodore Bouloukos|Sara Murphy|Gabby Tary|Rick Montgomery Jr.|Frank Mosley|Charlie Tacker|Maria Deasy|Sam Quartin|Nicholas Goroff|David Yorr|Andres Moral|Christine Nyland|Laura Pizzuti|Musa Aruna Kamara|Edward Columbia|Mary Barrese|Kimberlee Bowen|Rebecca Darlene Harland|Brittany Gough|Steve Halligan|Tzivia Halperin|Linda Rastellini Fuller|Emma Rogers|Anna Ruggiero|Joanna Wang|Lovella Ware|Lisa Zacks
title: Aimy in a Cage
